BackstoryDef.title: lighthouse keeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived away from the crowd in a lighthouse. Every evening, [PAWN_pronoun] tended the lanterns to make sure its warm glow illuminates the harbour. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed [PAWN_possessive] solitary life by the sea.

BackstoryDef.title: starlight navigator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an experienced navigator of the sea. [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] crew were once able to cross the Death Zone of the ocean. Through nights devoid of wind and currents, [PAWN_nameDef] relied on observations of stars and other celestial bodies to guide the way.

BackstoryDef.title: pearl diver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned a living as a pearl hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] could descend to depths of over hundred feet on a single breath. [PAWN_possessive] underwater agility had made [PAWN_objective]self a wanted figure among collectors.

BackstoryDef.title: coastal rescuer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] patrolled the coastline, always ready to respond to emergencies on both land and sea. [PAWN_possessive] swift and daring rescues have earned [PAWN_objective] the admiration of many survivors.

BackstoryDef.title: shaman of the sea
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After a famine, [PAWN_nameDef] led his clan to settle at the place where rivers meet the sea. [PAWN_pronoun] teaches [PAWN_possessive] people to worship the god of the sea because the deity seems much more generous, blessing them with abundant materials.

BackstoryDef.title: coral artisan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With skilled hands and an artist's eyes, [PAWN_nameDef] sculpted masterpieces from fallen coral and driftwood. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys bringing the beauty of the sea to the surface.

BackstoryDef.title: whale conservationist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], a passionate whale conservationist, dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to protecting the majestic creatures.\n\nHaving fought off countless whaling ships, [PAWN_nameDef] started to grow a disdain of the greedy mankind.

BackstoryDef.title: surfer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to ride the wave, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on an ocean planet and spent the majority of [PAWN_possessive] life on surfboards.

BackstoryDef.title: aquatic architect
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specializes in underwater building. Be it an open aquarium or submerged hotel, [PAWN_possessive] work always strikes the right balance between safety and aesthetic.

BackstoryDef.title: underwater treasure hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fearless adventurer who plunged into the depths of oceans in pursuit of hidden riches.\n\nWith a keen eye for exploration, [PAWN_nameDef] had uncovered the mysteries of many sunken ships and ancient civilizations, bringing back relics and valuables that tell stories of bygone eras.

BackstoryDef.title: sandcastle builder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up near the beach, [PAWN_nameDef] liked digging holes and building sandcastles. With the warm climate, burying [PAWN_objective]self in the sand quickly became [PAWN_possessive] favourite activity.

BackstoryDef.title: seashell trader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was business savvy from a young age. Growing up in a seaside town, [PAWN_pronoun] would often set up mini trade posts where [PAWN_pronoun] persuaded other children to exchange toys with [PAWN_objective] using seashells.

BackstoryDef.title: star thrower
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef] was young, [PAWN_pronoun] took it as [PAWN_possessive] duty to walk along the coastline, picking up starfish and other marine animals alike, and throwing them back into ocean.
